profile.title: Software Engineer
aboutMe: 7 years of experience in making scalable, secure, database driven web applications and internal tooling both with a team and as an individual
Excellent leadership skills and keen at meeting strict deadlines
Business-minded and know how to prioritize projects and tasks to maximize benefits to the organization
Accountable; I execute quickly and with high quality; I identify bottlenecks, resolve them, and keep projects moving forward

contractExperience.title: Software Architect
accomplishments: Developed all internal tooling and website which is approved by the Australian government for handling the workflow needed to safely assess and remove asbestos with over 3,000 completed projects and counting.
Build the client app with TDD for full e2e test coverage using CypressJs. Fully responsive and built using Typescript using Apollo + GQL served via Netlify all for no cost.
Serving a Serverless Lambda serving a GQL endpoint written in NodeJs using Prisma ORM to comminucate to an RDS instance, all for no cost and allowing for quick feature release.
Developed public facing website using GatsbyJS for blazing fast load times with a Lighthouse audit score of 95+ in all categories; complete with full SEO and Google Analytics.
This software is responsible for Jesco receiving a government contract to oversee the demolition of the loose fill asbestos insulated houses for years in Canberra, ACT.

contractExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Built internal web application (built with React, Typescript, and GraphQL) from the ground up that was pivotal in empowering Creative Strategists to find and replicate top performing ads.
Developed internal web application for helping teams find and interate on high performing ads.
All tooling used best practices in TDD for full e2e test coverage.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed numerous features and integrations with 3rd party companies to expand the companies reach and capabilities.
Led the integration of the API to Zendesk for customer service issue tracking and ticket creation.
Migrated the web application from in house payment system to Stripe.
Added Google autentication portal for all employees accessing production internal tooling.
Migrated legacy client web application from AngularJs to ReactJs with an animated signup flow as the crown jewel dramatically improving conversion and customer aquesition
Led the charge for the client applications to adopt typesafe practices using Flow.

workExperience.title: Applications Engineer
accomplishments: Brought the entire District into the world of AngularJs and away from server side templates in a no longer maintained language, Coldfusion
Developed custom ORM and query builder layer on top of Coldfusion for faster development work.

Launched major projects in record time that include a district wide mileage tracking software, inventory warehouse request/distribution software, special needs enrollment probram and a district wide volunteer signup and event management system.

projects.title: Lead Software Engineer
accomplishments: Worked with leadership to define engineering and product roadmap. Ran sprint planning, backlog grooming, gathered requirements and wrote tickets. Grew engineering team by leading hiring and establishing engineering best practices.

Led the development of internal insights web application (built with React, Typescript, and GraphQL) that was pivotal in empowering Creative Strategists to find and replicate top performing ads, which increased client retention and spending; leveraged Hasura to generate a GraphQL endpoint from an existing Postgres infrastructure, exposing Facebook data for the web application to consume.
Introduced and trained engineers in React, GraphQL, Typescript, and Test Driven Development.
Established automated CI/CD pipeline using CircleCI with full end-to-end testing using Cypress.io; increased velocity from 1 deploy a week to ~8 - 10 a week.
